text: James Brendan "Jim" Bolger (born 31 May 1935) is a New Zealand businessman and politician for the National Party. He was the 35th Prime Minister of New Zealand. He served as Prime Minister from 2 November 1990 to 8 December 1997. Bolger was born in Opunake, Taranaki. He is a Roman Catholic and has been married to Joan Riddell since 1963. They have nine children. ==References== ==Other websites== * Jim Bolger at New Zealand History Category:1935 births Category:New Zealand businesspeople Category:Living people Category:Politicians from North Island Category:Prime Ministers of New Zealand Category:Republicans Category:Roman Catholics
title: Jim Bolger
